name: 30 - T02 - Infernal Web (field+web)
author: Njc5YzFjZDI5NjZl
command:
let params = 
[{
    filterType: "field",
    filterId: "infernalWeb",
    shieldType: 1,
    gridPadding: 1.5,
    color: 0xCC2050,
    time: 0,
    blend: 3,
    intensity: 1,
    lightAlpha: 1,
    lightSize: 0.8,
    scale: 1,
    radius: 1,
    chromatic: false,
    zOrder: 512,
    animated :
    {
      time : 
      { 
        active: true, 
        speed: 0.0012, 
        animType: "move" 
      },
      lightSize:        
      {
        val1: 0.4, val2: 1.5,
        animType: "syncCosOscillation",
        loopDuration: 5000
      }
    }
}
,{
    filterType: "web",
    filterId: "infernalWeb",
    time: 100,
    div1: 16,
    div2: 8,
    tear: 0.45,
    amplitude: 0.8,
    thickness: 2,
    color: 0xAA3030,
    zOrder: 1024,
    animated :
    {
      time : 
      { 
        active: true, 
        speed: 0.0005, 
        animType: "move" 
      }
    }
}]

await TokenMagic.addUpdateFiltersOnSelected(params);
